title: El Dorado
creator_credit: John Alderson and Argosy-Crown Film Unit
brief_description: A travelogue of British Guiana describing the three natural divisions of the country, its peoples and its industries, and the way in which it is being developed.
description: A travelogue of British Guiana describing the three natural divisions of the country, its peoples and its industries, and the way in which it is being developed.
